body.p:
Hammonsville Ky Jany 9 1864
To the Hon His Excellency Governor Bramlett of Kentucky

Sir I have bound as security to the Commonwealth of Kentucky for Geo. W Dobson as well as shown by referense to copy of record I send you probably amounting now to near $300. which amount I am not able to pay without distress to myself & family. Therefore I will respectfully ask your Honor Excellcy to remit Said debt so far as my liability is covered and should it meet your approbation to do so you will confer on me a favor which will be gratefully remembered. Said Dobson is in the U. S. Army & has left nothing to pay with and it all comes upon me.

Geo. W. Dobs
R. S. Thomas
Petition

Remit all except fees & costs
Tho E Bramlette
